Articles.Content:
Finally got an early game plane working properly. For some reason I crashed about 1000 planes first.

Here is the craft

FirstPlane.zip
Great job! Took me a while to make one I ended up going through like 20 iterations. It’s always the landing gear that get me with the plane just veering off the runway during take off.

This sharing of a craft has been moved to the craft sharing subforum. 

And congratulations on your accomplishment.

Not bad at all. When slapping together a plane with these early parts, what gets me all the time are the rear landing gear. I put the main wings at the front, so the rear wheels can only go onto the fuselage, which makes them very narrowly packed. You dodged that issue with the canarded rear-wing design.

Also, am I seeing it right that you're packing two Mk1 fuel tanks in addition to the Mk0 ones the engines are mounted onto? That much fuel is enough for, like, circumnavigating Kerbin around 2/3 of the way. Not sure of the exact number, but one is enough to reach the poles. Just an FYI.

17 hours ago, AgingSimmer said:

Here is the craft

Nicely done!
